name: Michel C. A. Klein
content: Homepage Michel Klein – about my research, teaching, publications and personal interests Skip to content I’m an assistant professor in the Behavioural Informatics group in the AI section of the VU University Amsterdam. Read more about Michel Klein. My research is about intelligent support for people, sometimes called “human ambience”.
